name: Chill Out Steemit Style
description:
Chill Out Steemit style is the best option for stress- free commenting-
Smaller images for faster load, more speed, dark theme and comfortable colors, bigger letters, double-sided editor, huge reply button, bigger profile images, restyled commenting section.
Many parts of Steemit are removed, intentionally.
This style is geared towards comfortable reading and communication.
Stress free, fuss free and distraction free Steemit environment.

user.name: aschatria
user.about: Networker, hobby programmer, fiction writer, humorist, poet
